synonyms.synonym: NADH dehydrogenase [ubiquinone] 1 alpha subcomplex assembly factor 2

protein.specific_function: Acts as a molecular chaperone for mitochondrial complex I assembly

go_class.description: oxidoreductase activity, acting on nadh or nadph
